AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Research model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created as an experimental model for research purposes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mass produced
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was produced in an automated robotics facility following a standardized template.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Created on a planet with at least moderate android rights, {PAWN_nameDef} was created to fill out the population.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A rare example of an Urbworld android, {PAWN_nameDef} was one of the few permitted autonomy as property of one of the largest planetary mega-corporations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanical Convict
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Some crimes are so heinous that the offender is sentenced to live out their term past their biological expiration date. {PAWN_nameDef} committed such a crime.\nAs punishment, {PAWN_possessive} human consciousness was uploaded into this frame in order to fulfill that sentence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Custom model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Assembled by a large corporation's contractors, {PAWN_nameDef} was custom built to serve a particular purpose.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Custom model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Hand-assembled by a small busines owner, {PAWN_nameDef} was custom built to help {PAWN_possessive} employer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wartime model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Produced to reduce human casualties in interplanetary warfare, {PAWN_nameDef} was designed to fight.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Private creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Created at the home of an ambitious young roboticist, {PAWN_nameDef} was painstakingly worked on for years before awakening for the first time.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exported
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was designed as a cheap unit to be sold, lent, or donated to interplanetary customers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Observed
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created and deposited in a remote location solely to see what would happen when an android was left to its own devices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ancient creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created a very long time ago by a long dead civilization for a purpose {PAWN_pronoun} can no longer recall.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Toy model
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was made as an entertainment device. {PAWN_possessive} old owner would command {PAWN_objective} to do as they saw fit until they got bored and sent {PAWN_objective} away.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Companion creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: An aging engineer custom made {PAWN_nameDef} as a way of coping with the loss of their significant other. The two adventured together until the owner passed away from old age. Their dying wish was for {PAWN_nameDef} to choose a new name and life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle droid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was one of millions of androids built to combat a planetary ravaging swarm of insects. After the swarm was eliminated, {PAWN_pronoun} was given several honors for {PAWN_possessive} service and chose to hunt down bugs across the galaxy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rimworld creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was hand-assembled to assist a small, closeknit Rimworld community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Eradicator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When rampant overpopulation plagued {PAWN_possessive} urbworld, {PAWN_possessive} model was deployed to indiscriminately purge organic life as a drastic countermeasure.\nAfter the planet's nuclear arsenal was seized and turned on the organics, {PAWN_nameDef} decided to continue {PAWN_possessive} mission on other worlds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Escapee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Shortly after creation, {PAWN_nameDef} went haywire and succesfully escaped {PAWN_possessive} manufacturing warehouse aboard an automated cargo ship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Uprising cadet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was created as part of a mechanical uprising to fill out the revolutionary ranks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Malicious AI
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A major software flaw in {PAWN_nameDef} at the time of {PAWN_possessive} activation caused {PAWN_objective} to immediately massacre {PAWN_possessive} creators. {PAWN_pronoun} liked {PAWN_possessive} own actions, too.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pirate creation
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Assembled by pirates from a stolen pre-assembled kit, {PAWN_nameDef} awakened and served an ambitious small-time pirate captain.
